name: Empire Creative Marketing
description:
Through strategic marketing on the web, print, video, & beyond! Embark on your journey to success with our team of dedicated creative professionals at Empire Creative Marketing. Experience the superior quality of service and care exclusively enjoyed by our clients.
Empire Creative Marketing (Empire Advertising & Design, LLC) is a full-service, turn-key design agency that specializes in professional graphic design, web site design, printing services, videography and more! 
It is our job to make your company look good. If it can be printed, viewed on the web, emailed, mailed, or photographed, we can make it happen!
Audiences love a good story. At Empire Creative Marketing, we focus on telling powerful stories that move and inspire the viewers. Our many years of experience in the film production world has given us insight into what works.
Whether you are looking to produce a brand story, corporate video, training video, TV commercial or feature film, our team is ready for action. Our clients include industries such as oil and gas, medical, real estate, retail products, food services, hospitality and beyond!
